cms.query.QueryText: IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 SessionIdentificator FROM [Analytics_ExitPages] WHERE ExitPageLastModified > @Date) BEGIN DELETE FROM [Analytics_ExitPages] WHERE SessionIdentificator = @SessionID INSERT INTO [Analytics_ExitPages] ([SessionIdentificator], [ExitPageNodeID], [ExitPageLastModified], [ExitPageSiteID], [ExitPageCulture]) VALUES (@SessionID, @NodeID, @Date, @SiteID, @Culture) END
